meaningMnemonic: An <radical>elf</radical> who ventures outside in <radical>winter</radical> has a lot of <kanji>daring</kanji>. Elf ears are very, very delicate, and the winter cold can really mess them up. So if you see an elf adventuring in winter, know that that particular elf is a really daring dude.
readingMnemonic: The amount of <kanji>daring</kanji> you'd need is about equal to the amount Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん) had. And he was really daring!
